subject: Formal Complaint on behalf of Overgas Inc. (Bulgaria)
text:
CONFIDENTIAL

Dear Sir or Madam,

 

Please find attached a formal complaint on behalf of Overgas Inc. AD, Bulgaria’s largest private trader of natural gas. The
complaint addresses infringements of EU law by the Ministry of Energy of Bulgaria. More precisely, Overgas Inc. AD submits that
the Ministry of Energy violates its obligations under Art. 6b(1) and Art. 6b(2) of Regulation (EU) 2017/1938, as amended by
Regulation (EU) 2022/1932 of the European Parliament and of the Council.

 

The complaint is explicitly supported by the following companies, which are also affected by the Ministry of Energy’s behaviour
subject to this complaint:

 

Global Commerce-1 OOD,
attn. of Mr. Stefan Shishkov, Managing Director
ul. Yoakim Gruev 15A
4000 Plovdiv
glc1@abv.bg [glc1@abv.bg]

 

Sustainable Energy Supply OOD
attn. Of Mr. Valentin Zlatev, Managing Director
Alexander Dondukov Blvd 33
1000 Sofia
ses.office@litasco.bg [ses.office@litasco.bg]

 

TIBIEL EOD
attn. of Mr. Dimitar Ivanov, Managing Director
Knyaz Alexander Dondukov Blvd 29
1000 Sofia
office@tibiel.com [office@tibiel.com]

 

Like Overgas Inc., these companies stand ready to provide the Commission with further information.

 

Please do not hesitate to contact us should you have any questions.

 

Yours sincerely,

 

SEBASTIAN GRÖSS  |  RECHTSANWALT (PRINCIPAL ASSOCIATE)

 

SZA Schilling, Zutt & Anschütz  Rechtsanwaltsgesellschaft mbH

Square de Meeûs 23
